1.title: Pilot
1.plot: Seattle Federal Agent Quinn Callahan and his small task force set off to track down a suspected Puget Sound underworld known as the Bellamari. The underworld is suspected to be involved with stolen gems and precious stones.

2.title: The Map Room
2.plot: Callahan and Sydney discover a secret map room that helps lead them to a series of clues which include connecting Seattle businessman and suspected Jewel thief Amir Kasra to the underworld organization the Bellamari.

3.title: The Bellamari
3.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

imdb.plot outline: Federal Agent Quinn Callahan and his small group of Special FBI agents attempt to track down a suspected local Puget Sound organized underworld or Secret Society known as the Bellamari. Local popular urbanite business owner and celebrity Amir Kasra owns some of the most popular Seattle restaurants and lounges in the city. Although having been investigated for many years, Agent Callahan, is convinced his empire is a legitimate front and breeding grounds for the mythical and secretive esoteric organization, the Bellamari. Originating hundreds of years ago in Sicily, the secret society is rumored to be involved in rare Gem smuggling and stolen antiquities throughout the Pacific Northwest With years of resistance from the local DA's and FBI Divisional office, Callahan requests help from Montreal Canadian Professor of Linguistics and Archeology Dr. Sydney Jordan in a last ditch effort to resolve the case he's put together proving the modern day existence of this mystic secret society. With only 3 weeks to finalize his theories, the two join forces for an elaborate adventure seeking clues and evidence in hopes to connect the dots of the age old mystery of the Bellamari and it's possible modern day reorganization on the West Coast. Her cleverness and keen knowledge of Linguistics, archeology and secret society folk lore might be the missing link Callahan needs to crack the case. The Bellamari will stop at nothing to protect the mythical existence of their secret society and foothold in the Puget Sound Region for illegal activities.
